bibl.title: Port Communities and the Erythraean Sea Trade. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Paper presented at the Annual International Egyptological Colloquium 2011, entitled Mariners and Traders: Connections between the Red Sea Littoral, Arabia and Beyond, held at The British Museum on 2 August 2011. - Introduction. - The Red Sea ports of the Eastern Desert and their populations [Berenike (Berenice); - Myos Hormos (Quseir al-Qadim)]. - Consumption practices and maritime activities [Fish and fishing equipment; - Ship technology; - Diet and dining]. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan

bibl.seg: 241 Bérénice (mer Rouge) Désert Oriental Mer Rouge Myos Hormos 730
Thomas Ross I., Port Communities and the Erythraean Sea Trade. Avec résumé en anglais.

British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan 18 (2012) pp. 169-199, 12 figg. n./bl. et coul. [Uniquement accessible en ligne, en téléchargement gratuit: < http://www.britishmuseum.org/research/publications/online_journals/bmsaes/issue_18/thomas.aspx >.]

Paper presented at the Annual International Egyptological Colloquium 2011, entitled Mariners and Traders: Connections between the Red Sea Littoral, Arabia and Beyond, held at The British Museum on 2 August 2011. - Introduction. - The Red Sea ports of the Eastern Desert and their populations [Berenike (Berenice); - Myos Hormos (Quseir al-Qadim)]. - Consumption practices and maritime activities [Fish and fishing equipment; - Ship technology; - Diet and dining]. - Conclusion.
